{{cpp/memory/scoped_allocator_adaptor/title|inner_allocator}}
{{cpp/memory/scoped_allocator_adaptor/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|scoped_allocator}}
{{dcl | num=1 | since=c++11 | 
inner_allocator_type&amp; inner_allocator() noexcept;
}}
{{dcl | num=2 | since=c++11 | 
const inner_allocator_type&amp; inner_allocator() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

获得到用于声明此 {{tt|scoped_allocator_adaptor}} 的内层分配器的引用。

若 {{c|1=sizeof...(InnerAllocs) == 0}}，即未声明内层分配器，则返回 {{c|*this}}。否则返回到 {{c|std::scoped_allocator_adaptor&lt;InnerAllocs...&gt;}} 的一个引用，即由 {{c|*this}} 的所有内层分配器组成的有作用域分配器，其首个内层分配器变为外层分配器。

===参数===
（无）

===返回值===
到内层分配器的引用，它自身亦是 {{tt|std::scoped_allocator_adaptor}}。

===参阅===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/scoped_allocator_adaptor/dsc outer_allocator}}
{{dsc end}}
